aiPromptTemplates.titleGeneration: Generate 5 compelling meta titles for [PAGE_TYPE] that include: primary keyword near start, brand name at end, emotional triggers (verified, safe, premium), and location if applicable. Keep under 60 characters.
aiPromptTemplates.descriptionGeneration: Create 3 meta descriptions under 160 characters that: answer user intent, include primary keyword, add value proposition (numbers, benefits), include CTA, mention safety/discretion, and specify 18+ restriction.
optimizationPrinciples: Place primary keyword within first 15 words of title
Include brand name at end of title
Use emotional triggers: verified, safe, premium, available
Add numeric data: profile counts, city coverage
Include location specificity for local pages
